short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your browser on a fun vacation with Jinx in a stunning live wallpaper! 🌴☀️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Escape to a tropical paradise with the Jinx on Vacation Live Wallpaper for Chrome. Every new tab brings Jinx in a relaxing vacation setting, offering a vibrant, playful atmosphere with bright animations and joyful vibes. This extension guarantees a smooth, fast, and secure browsing experience while you enjoy Jinx's vacation fun.

Features:
🌞 Jinx on vacation live wallpapers with sunny, tropical scenes
🌐 Quick access to your favorite site shortcuts
🔍 Customizable search bar with your preferred search engine
📂 Developer information and easy removal links
Bring the vacation vibes to your browser with Jinx today! 🌺🕶️
